sourcesContent:
import React, { useMemo } from 'react'; import DashboardLayout from '../components/Layout/DashboardLayout'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { GraduationCap, Users2, BookOpen, CalendarClock, BarChart3, ArrowRight, Gauge, LineChart, ClipboardCheck, UserPlus } from 'lucide-react'; const classNodes = [ ['Vectors', 0.38], ['Mechanics', 0.61], ['Electromagnetics', 0.52], ['Optics', 0.72], ['Thermodynamics', 0.43], ['Modern Physics', 0.68], ['Lab Skills', 0.81], ['Project Work', 0.55], ['Practice Tests', 0.75] ]; const getClassMastery = () => { // TODO: Replace with GPU-trained GNN aggregation for cohort knowledge maps return Math.round(classNodes.reduce((acc, [, value]) => acc + value, 0) / classNodes.length * 100); }; const predictClassForgetRisk = () => { // TODO: Replace with forgetting prediction model aggregated over student cohorts return 'Medium'; }; const TeacherDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const analyticsCards = useMemo( () => [ { label: 'Courses managed', value: 4, icon: BookOpen, accent: 'bg-[#ede9fe] text-[#4338ca]', detail: '2 with adaptive cohorts' }, { label: 'Active learners', value: 118, icon: Users2, accent: 'bg-[#cffafe] text-[#0f766e]', detail: '12 at-risk identified' }, { label: 'Average mastery', value: `${getClassMastery()}%`, icon: Gauge, accent: 'bg-[#fef9c3] text-[#92400e]', detail: `Forget risk ${predictClassForgetRisk()}` }, { label: 'Doubts resolved (week)', value: 246, icon: ClipboardCheck, accent: 'bg-[#bfdbfe] text-[#1d4ed8]', detail: '+58% vs last month' } ], [] ); const comparisonSeries = [ { name: 'Aria Patel', mastery: 89, trend: '+8%' }, { name: 'Karthik Rao', mastery: 74, trend: '+2%' }, { name: 'Rhea S.', mastery: 62, trend: '-5%' }, { name: 'Zaid Khan', mastery: 96, trend: '+11%' } ]; const conceptWeakness = [ { concept: 'Wave Optics', severity: 'High', action: 'Schedule revision lab' }, { concept: 'Magnetic Flux', severity: 'Medium', action: 'Assign practice set' }, { concept: 'Rotational Dynamics', severity: 'Monitor', action: 'Review after quiz' } ]; const studentList = [ { name: 'Aria Patel', status: 'Accelerating', avatar: 'AP', color: 'bg-[#dcfce7] text-[#166534]' }, { name: 'Ishaan Verma', status: 'Needs support', avatar: 'IV', color: 'bg-[#fee2e2] text-[#991b1b]' }, { name: 'Riya Sharma', status: 'Consistent', avatar: 'RS', color: 'bg-[#dbeafe] text-[#1d4ed8]' }, { name: 'Tanishq Rao', status: 'Rejoining', avatar: 'TR', color: 'bg-[#ede9fe] text-[#4338ca]' } ]; return (

Cohort intelligence hub

Good morning, {user?.name ?? 'Mentor'}

Your classes updated overnight. Review mastery hotspots, compare learners and deploy interventions with one click.

Cohorts monitored 4

Daily sync complete

{analyticsCards.map((card) => (

{card.label}

{card.value}

{card.detail}

))}

Class knowledge heatmap

Each tile shows concept mastery across the cohort. Darker shades = stronger proficiency.

Auto refreshed
{classNodes.map(([label, mastery]) => (

{label}

Mastery {Math.round(mastery * 100)}%

))}
Needs attention Excelling

Upcoming schedule

{[ { subject: 'Mechanics lab', time: '09:00', learners: 32 }, { subject: 'Wave optics seminar', time: '11:30', learners: 24 }, { subject: 'Mentor office hours', time: '14:00', learners: 12 } ].map((item) => (

{item.subject}

{item.time}

{item.learners} learners enrolled

))}
Manage class roster

Student comparison

{comparisonSeries.map((student) => (

{student.name}

Trend {student.trend}

{student.mastery}%
))}

Concept weakness tracker

{conceptWeakness.map((row) => ( ))}
Concept Severity Recommended action
{row.concept} {row.severity} {row.action}

Student spotlight

{studentList.map((student) => (
{student.avatar}

{student.name}

{student.status}

Open profile
))}

Deploy interventions

Create custom revision playlists or escalate support tickets. ML recommendations refresh every six hours.

Launch intervention
); }; export default TeacherDashboard;
